# sds-table



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

This is a simple table wrapper, that applies styles to any tables within

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                        | Type                           | Default   |
| ------------- | ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- |
| `alignment`   | `alignment`   | Sets the text alignment of the table                                               | `"center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `'start'` |
| `bleed`       | `bleed`       | Removes radius and left/right border width                                         | `boolean`                      | `false`   |
| `dense`       | `dense`       | Reduces spacing between cells                                                      | `boolean`                      | `false`   |
| `grid`        | `grid`        | Applies horizontal lines between cells                                             | `boolean`                      | `false`   |
| `interactive` | `interactive` | Adds background color changing on hover (only visible in conjunction with striped) | `boolean`                      | `false`   |
| `striped`     | `striped`     | Applies alternating backgrounds for rows                                           | `boolean`                      | `false`   |


----------------------------------------------
